channel.title: Portfolios on Andrew's Data Science Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Andrew's Data Science Blog

item.title: Histogram
item.description: Player’s weight distribution using a histogram. library(Lahman) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) df<-Master%>% filter(!is.na(weight))%>% select(weight) ggplot()+ geom_histogram(data=df,aes(x=weight),color="white",fill="blue",bins=40)+ ggtitle("Baseball Player Weight Distribution")

item.title: ScatterPlot
item.description:
library(Lahman) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) library(ggiraph) df<-Batting%>% group_by(playerID)%>% summarize(career_HR=sum(HR),career_SO=sum(SO))%>% filter(career_HR>=400) HR_vs_SO<-inner_join(df,Master,by=c("playerID"))%>% select(nameFirst,nameLast,career_HR,career_SO) HR_vs_SO$name<-paste(HR_vs_SO$nameFirst,HR_vs_SO$nameLast) ———————————— g<-ggplot()+ geom_point_interactive(data=HR_vs_SO,aes(x=career_SO,y=career_HR,tooltip=name,data_id=nameLast))+ ggtitle("Career Homeruns vs. Strikeouts for Great Hitters")+ xlab("Career Strikeouts")+ ylab("Career Homeruns") ggiraph(code=print(g),hover_css="fill:white;stroke:black") {"x":{"html":"
